newsitem.title: USA: First Team Sports unveiling new skates.
newsitem.headline: First Team Sports unveiling new skates.

text.p: First Team Sports Inc, which makes UltraWheels in-line skates, said Monday it will unveil its 1998 product line at the National Sporting Goods Association world expo in Chicago July 12 through 14.
The 1998 line includes the UltraWheels BioFit Series of skates.
UltraWheels also will introduce the LiteMax series, designed for recreational skaters, and the Italian-designed Flextec series.

Sabotage, UltraWheels' aggressive line, will introduce three new models -- Section 8, Article 15 and Standard Issue. The Classic 99 will be the first in a series of new hockey products to be introduced by UltraWheels in 1998.
